Judul: INTELLIGENT AGENT FOR PREDICTING STOCK MARKET BASED ON ANFIS
Abstrak:
Technical analysis is one way to predict future stock prices by observing the trends of data time series in 

graphical form. Besides that, investors need a long time periode to observe and to analyze the data time series. 

This study developed a system to answer this problem by using ANFIS and JADE (Java Agent Development 

Framework)-based agent applications. The ANFIS is used to predict future stock prices and the JADE-based 

agent application is used to retrieve data from a website and it runs the system automatically to provide the 

results of the stock price prediction. The accuracy of this system that uses ANFIS in this study is 88.25% for real 

data stock and 85.17% for simulation data. In addition, JADE-based agent has been run well for retrieving data 

from the website and it has run the system automatically to display the results of prediction for the future stock 

price. Therefore, this system can minimalsize the time for investors to predict stock price in the future.
